name: Thumbsplunk-Digipen2018
description:
Made during the fall of 2018 during my time at the Digipen high school course, Thumbsplunk is a short, 2D metroidvania style platformer game built on the zero engine that was largely the first solo game I had ever worked on to completion. Which made it a great learning experience at the time, naturally though like many student projects it has its share of bugs and issues, but never the less I enjoyed working on it.

WASD or arrow keys will move the character left and right with the space bar serving as jump.
